name: Bolita (Diegovz01)
description:
WASD to move the Bolita. Mouse to move the camera. Alt-F4 to exit (yes, no exit button).

Bolita has many skins with different physics that may help her overcome the obstacles, or make them harder. Collect points to increase your score but you will lose all of them if you die. 

Reach the end to finish the game. 

Help Bolita. It's her birthday!

Code, music, art and level design by Diego Vázquez

The game has some bugs, known bugs:

  • Scores may reset sometimes.
  • Bad sound volume levels (sorry).
  • Missing sound effects.
  • Weird physics (not a bug, it's a feature!, Bolita is a living being, don't judge her please).

This is my first approach to 3D game development. I always wanted to make a marble rolling game, Bolita is my child. 

Pro tip: Don't kill Bolita.

If you rage quit the game you are killing Bolita, in fact, the whole universe where Bolita lives gets destroyed, but don't worry much, another version of it is created the moment you open the game again, but maybe that would not be the Bolita we all know and love.
